title: Guest commentary: For safe jobs, EV battery workers need a union contract
description: The UAW is aware of the grave dangers of an ill-equipped and unrepresented workforce.
author: Shawn Fain
excerpt: The UAW is aware of the grave dangers of an ill-equipped and unrepresented workforce.
